compatibility.notes: OSL-1.1 allows for linking with proprietary software under certain conditions, but care must be taken to comply with its terms when distributing combined works.

key_requirements: Must include a notice stating the work is licensed under the Open Software License version 1.1.
Must not sublicense the Original Work or Derivative Works.
Must not use Licensor's trademarks without permission.
license.name: OSL-1.1
obligations: Provide a machine-readable copy of the Source Code when distributing the Original Work or Derivative Works.
License any distributed copies of the Original Work or Derivative Works under the same Open Software License.
Include the license text and copyright notice with any distributed copies.
